awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 12 nominations.

fullplot: An investigative and powerfully emotional documentary about the epidemic of rape of soldiers within the US military, the institutions that perpetuate and cover up its existence, and its profound personal and social consequences.
plot: An investigative documentary about the epidemic of rape of soldiers within the US military.
title: The Invisible War

tomatoes.consensus: The Invisible War is a vital and frank expose on sexual assault in the U.S. military, shot by master filmmaker Kirby Dick (This Film is Not Yet Rated).
